introText: I’m a software engineer based in sunny Redondo Beach, California, with a unique path from graduating summa cum laude in Mechanical Engineering at UC San Diego to pursuing my passion for software development. I work in the space sector as an embedded flight software engineer, developing automation tools with Python, enhancing communication satellite codebases with C++, and configuring Linux-based testing and build environments. My experience also includes professional work in computer vision at the UCSD Medically Advanced Devices Laboratory and HP Inc. Currently, I’ve taken on leadership roles within my team, guiding engineers on embedded flight software architecture details, coordinating FSW development with different teams and external companies, and driving projects through the full software lifecycle using agile methodologies. Thanks for visiting my website—let’s build something extraordinary together!
